summary: Standalone CARBON ELITE Armor & 4 CARBON-FIBRE BLADES, 2 CARBON-FIBRE AXES & 1 CARBON-FIBRE BOW (+arrows)
descriptionHtml:
Standalone CARBON ELITE Armor & CARBON WEAPONS v1.5

This Mod adds a standalone Set of the following:

-CARBON ELITE Body Armor (Capeless Nightingale with carbon-fibre optic)
-CARBON KATANA
-CARBON NODACHI
-CARBON WAKIZASHI
-CARBON TANTO
-CARBON BATTLEAXE (v1.5)
-CARBON WARAXE (v1.5)
-CARBON BOW & ARROWs (v1.5)
-CBBE CARBON ELITE ARMOR for females (v1.5)

The Armor & Weapons can be crafted within the Misc/(sometimes in Ebony) Section at a forge, and can also be upgraded and the grindstone, or workbench.


If you don\'t have the material or the required Smithing Skill: type \"help carbon 0\" into your console for the form IDs and then add with \"player.additem <form-ID> 1\")

More Carbon-Trimmed Bows with the standalone CAMO RANGER GEAR: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9399

-also a 1024 RES version available as optional download (still 1.1 versions though, without the new weapons)

v1.5 UPDATE:
   - female meshes have been fixed (the gaps in the armpits) and also with cbbe-mesh in download
   - fiddled with the normal maps a little more to get a more realisitc subtle reflection from the Carbon-fibre...
   - 3 new carbon fibre weapons included:
    -> Carbon Elite Axe (WarAxe)
    -> Carbon Elite Headcutter (BattleAxe)
    -> Carbon Ultra Flex Bow (+Arrows: carbon projectiles)

v1.51:
   - new Katanas specular-maps I forgot are now included (to reduce shinynes)

v1.1 UPDATE:
   - The suit now has a matte finish, wish less reflection going on. (got a lesson in specular- & normal-maps ;) )
   - Weapontextures now also with new normal-map

V1.0 -> for those who like the shiny version, just keep the old files and don\'t update ;) (it\'s really just the specular finsih)...

...more to come


Installation:
===================
Copy the meshes and textures folder, as well as the .esp File into your skyrim \\data\\ folder.
Enable the ESP within the Data Files option, or by editing the plugins.txt


De-Install:
===================
Delete the copied files from your skyrim Data folder.
Remove the ESP files from Datafiles, or plugins.txt


Issues:
===============
In the inventory, the Armor won\'t have the CARBON texture, but when you put it on it will. (anyone tell me how to make the inventory item have the custom textures too?)


Future:
============
Will be modelling totally new looking gear, but that\'s gonna take some time.
Also will have a complete questline, combined with my CAMO RANGER equipment, some Time- & Dimension-Travel to explain the origin of the modern gear, and some more, which is to be a surprise :D
and might handle any requests...


Enjoy

-rioc
author: rioc
